com.googlecode.gmail4j.http
Class HttpGmailConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gmail4j.GmailConnection
      com.googlecode.gmail4j.http.HttpGmailConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProxyAware
public class HttpGmailConnection
extends GmailConnection
implements ProxyAware

GmailConnection implementation that uses HTTP transport.

It is Proxy aware. Example use: 

     GmailClient client = //...
     GmailConnection conn = new HttpGmailConnection(gmailUser, gmailPass);
     client.setConnection(conn);

When using with Proxy: 

     GmailClient client = //...
     HttpGmailConnection conn = new HttpGmailConnection(gmailUser, gmailPass);
     conn.setProxy(proxyHost, proxyPort);
     conn.setProxyCredentials(proxyUser, proxyPass);
     client.setConnection(conn);

Since:
0.2
